summary: The diff fully implements all 10 requirements. The new CleanClaimIntelligence.tsx page contains all requested sections (hero, revenue loss factors, solution, 10 validation layers with accordion, differentiators, business impact, stakeholders, CTA, and contact). The route '/clean-claim-intelligence' is added to App.tsx and the navigation link is present in Navigation.tsx for both desktop and mobile. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
